analyzed: @121b phra rgyas gang dag yin pa dang de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa sems las byung ba sems pa la sogs pa gang dag yin pa dang / tshor ba la sogs pa de dag thams cad kyi ldan pa ma yin pa thob pa dang skye ba dang rga ba dang gnas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid gang dag yin pa de ni 'du byed kyi phung po yin no //
translated: The volitions that are associated with those, such as intention and so on, and the nonassociated formative factors such as obtainment, birth, aging, duration and impermanence of all those such as feeling are the formation aggregate.

original: de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po yin te /
analyzed: de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po yin te /
translated: The mental consciousness that is associated with those is the consciousness aggregate.

original: de ltar na mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni phung po bzhi'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni phung po bzhi'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
translated: Thus the object abandoned by the path of seeing is by nature the four aggregates.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams yin no //
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni de las gzhan pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams yin no //
translated: The object abandoned by the path of meditation is other than that, that is, it is all contaminated phenomena.

original: ji ltar zhe na phyi dang nang gi gzugs zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni gzugs kyi phung po yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na phyi dang nang gi gzugs zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni gzugs kyi phung po yin no //
translated: How is that? All contaminated internal and external form is the form aggregate.

original: zag pa med pa dang mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma gtogs pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dag ni phung po bzhi ste /
analyzed: zag pa med pa dang mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma gtogs pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dag ni phung po bzhi ste /
translated: Feeling, discernment, formation, and consciousness, except for that which is uncontaminated and that which is abandoned by the path of seeing, are the four aggregates.

original: de ltar na bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni phung po lnga'i ngo bo nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni phung po lnga'i ngo bo nyid yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus the object abandoned by the path of meditation should be understood as being by nature the five aggregates.

original: sems kyang bcu drug ste de dag nyid do zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba nas bsgom pas spang bar bya ba zhes bya ba'i bar lnga dang / de bzhin du gzugs na spyod pa dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa lnga lnga dang zag pa med pa'i sems te sems bcu drug go //

translated: Similarly, there are five minds of the form realm and five minds of the formless realm, making ten, and the uncontaminated mind is the sixteenth.

original: de dag ni chos bcu drug la dmigs pa yin par brjod do //
analyzed: de dag ni chos bcu drug la dmigs pa yin par brjod do //
translated: They are said to focus on the sixteen phenomena.🔽Here, how many negative tendencies are there?

original: 'di la ni phra rgyas 'di snyed cig ces bya ba ni chos 'di la ni phra rgyas sems de dang mtshungs par ldan pa gang dag yin pa 'di snyed cig dmigs pa'am mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni brtag par

translated: This should be analyzed: “How many negative tendencies that are concomitant with that mind focus on this phenomenon and increase through focusing or concomitance?”

analyzed: de dag ni rang gi gsum @122a * // dang gzugs su gtogs pa gcig dang dri ma med pa yang yin la rnam par shes pa yang yin pas /

translated: The three realms of desire, form, and formlessness are the three realms of desire, form, and formlessness.

translated: The three realms of desire, form,

original: re zhig sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas go rims bzhin du bcu dang bdun dang de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang /🔽de rnams kyis thob pa rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa dag dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas bzhi dang de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang de rnams kyis thob pa rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa dag dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs thams cad dang /
analyzed: re zhig sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas go rims bzhin du bcu dang bdun dang de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang / de rnams kyis thob pa rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa dag dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas bzhi dang de dag dang lhan cig 'byung ba dang de rnams kyis thob pa rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa dag dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs thams cad dang /
translated: The suffering and origin of the desire realm are the ten and seven negative tendencies abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering and origin, respectively, and those that arise simultaneously with them.

original: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i chos gzhan dag ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i chos gzhan dag ste /
translated: The four negative tendencies abandoned by the path of meditation and those that arise simultaneously with them and obtainment of those negative tendencies that arise simultaneously with them and obtainment of all contaminated form and other nonvirtuous phenomena.

original: chos 'di dag ni sems lnga'i dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: chos 'di dag ni sems lnga'i dmigs pa yin no //
translated: These phenomena are the focal objects of five minds.

original: gang dag gi yin zhe na /🔽rang gi khams pa gsum ste /
analyzed: gang dag gi yin zhe na / rang gi khams pa gsum ste /
translated: What are they?🔽They are the three of one's own realm.

original: de dag nyid ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de dag nyid ces bya ba smos te /
translated: They are the three of one's own realm.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams kyi'o //
translated: They are objects abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering and origin and by the path of meditation in the desire realm.

original: ji lta zhe na re zhig sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na re zhig sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni /
translated: How is this?🔽Those objects abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering are concomitant with pervasive and nonpervasive states abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering, concomitant with pervasive states abandoned by seeing the truth of origin and virtuous objects abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun du 'gro ba dang kun du 'gro ba ma yin pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dge ba dang 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi 'dod pa na spyod pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i gnas skabs sam /
analyzed: sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun du 'gro ba dang kun du 'gro ba ma yin pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dge ba dang 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi 'dod pa na spyod pa'i chos la dmigs pa'i gnas skabs sam /
translated: Or they are objects of the desire realm that are focal objects of the mundane path of the desire realm when one is born in the desire realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams su skyes pa 'dod pa'i khams la lta ba'i gnas skabs na gzugs na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba gcig kho na dang / zag pa med pa chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams su skyes pa 'dod pa'i khams la lta ba'i gnas skabs na gzugs na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba gcig kho na dang / zag pa med pa chos shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa ste /
translated: When one born in the form realm views the desire realm, the object of the single afflicted mind of the form realm that is to be abandoned by the path of meditation and the uncontaminated mind compatible with Dharma knowledge

original: sems lnga'i dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: sems lnga'i dmigs pa yin no //
translated: are the objects of five minds.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems dag gis dmigs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems dag gis dmigs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The minds of the desire realm that are to be abandoned by seeing the truths of cessation and path are not objects of those two minds.

original: zag pa med pa la dmigs pa'i sems dag ni 'gog pa dang lam dag la dmigs pa'i phyir zag ba dang bcas pa la dmigs pa dag kyang 'gog pa dang lam mthong @122b bas spang bar bya ba tsam la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zag pa med pa la dmigs pa'i sems dag ni 'gog pa dang lam dag la dmigs pa'i phyir zag ba dang bcas pa la dmigs pa dag kyang 'gog pa dang lam mthong @122b bas spang bar bya ba tsam la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the two uncontaminated minds that focus on the truths of cessation and path focus on the truths of cessation and path, and because the two contaminated minds that focus on the truths of cessation and path focus on the mere truths of cessation and path.

original: sa gong ma'i nyon mongs ba can rnams kyi yang ma yin te /
analyzed: sa gong ma'i nyon mongs ba can rnams kyi yang ma yin te /
translated: Also the afflicted minds of higher realms are not objects of those two minds.

original: sa 'og ma la dmigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sa 'og ma la dmigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they do not focus on lower levels.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni dge ba'i yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni dge ba'i yang ma yin te /
translated: Also the virtuous minds of the formless realm are not objects of those two minds.

original: ring ba nyid ba zhis ring ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ring ba nyid ba zhis ring ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is distant due to being distant.

original: de bzhin du kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba yang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnam pa gnyis dang / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dge ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba yang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnam pa gnyis dang / sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dge ba dang /
translated: Similarly, that which is to be abandoned by seeing the truth of origin is the focal object of five: two that are to be abandoned by seeing the truth of origin, one that is to be abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering that is pervasive, one virtuous object to be abandoned by the path of meditation,

original: gzugs na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba gcig kho na dang zag pa med pa ste /🔽lnga kho na'i dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba gcig kho na dang zag pa med pa ste / lnga kho na'i dmigs pa yin no //
translated: and one object to be abandoned by the path of meditation in the form realm and uncontaminated states.🔽That which is to be abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering is the focal object of four: two that are to be abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering, one that is to be abandoned by seeing the truth of origin that is pervasive, and one virtuous object to be abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: 'dir yang bshad pa ni snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang bshad pa ni snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
translated: The explanation here should be understood as before.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag kyang sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ci rigs par dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang /
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dag kyang sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ci rigs par dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa dang /
translated: Also, those to be abandoned by the path of meditation are the five: the mind associated with the pervasive negative tendencies to be abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering and origin and the virtuous, nonvirtuous and neutral minds to be abandoned by the path of meditation.🔽The formless realm has five objects: the formless realm itself, the form realm, the desire realm, uncontaminated states and the truth of cessation.

original: gzugs na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba gcig kho na dang / zag pa med pa dang lnga kho na'i dmigs pa kho na yin te /🔽snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba gcig kho na dang / zag pa med pa dang lnga kho na'i dmigs pa kho na yin te / snga ma bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
translated: The formless realm itself is the object of the formless realm itself, the form realm is the object of the formless realm itself, the desire realm is the object of the formless realm itself, uncontaminated states are the object of the formless realm itself and the truth of cessation is the object of the formless realm itself.

original: gzugs khams las skyes rang gi dang // 'og gsum gong gcig dri med kyi //🔽zhes bya ba ni /🔽rang gi gsum dang 'og ma'i gsum ni rang gi dang 'og gsum ste /
analyzed: gzugs khams las skyes rang gi dang // 'og gsum gong gcig dri med kyi // zhes bya ba ni / rang gi gsum dang 'og ma'i gsum ni rang gi dang 'og gsum ste /
translated: The formless realm is the object of the formless realm itself, the form realm, the three of the desire realm, the one of the higher realm and the uncontaminated.

original: rang gi dang 'og ma gsum dang gong ma gcig dang / dri ma med pa zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
analyzed: rang gi dang 'og ma gsum dang gong ma gcig dang / dri ma med pa zhes tshig rnam par sbyar ro //
translated: The formless realm itself is the object of the formless realm itself, the form realm is the object of the formless realm itself, the three of the desire realm are the object of the formless realm itself, the one of the higher realm is the object of the formless realm itself and the uncontaminated is the object of the formless realm itself.🔽The formless realm is the object of the formless realm itself, the form realm, the three of the desire realm, the one of the higher realm and the uncontaminated.

original: chos rnam pa gsum po de dag nyid gzugs na spyod pa zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ste /🔽de dag gi skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos rnam pa gsum po de dag nyid gzugs na spyod pa zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ste / de dag gi skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are called objects to be abandoned by the path of meditation because they are objects to be abandoned by the path of meditation.🔽They are the focal objects of eight consciousnesses:🔽three of its own realm,

original: de dag ni sems brgyad kyi dmigs pa yin te rang gi khams pa gsum ste /
analyzed: de dag ni sems brgyad kyi dmigs pa yin te rang gi khams pa gsum ste /
translated: three of lower realms,🔽and two of higher realms.

original: de dag nyid dang zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: de dag nyid dang zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ste /
translated: Three of its own realm are the three objects to be abandoned by the path of meditation: those abandoned by the path of seeing that which views suffering and origin and those abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya'o //🔽khams 'og ma pa gsum ste /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya'o // khams 'og ma pa gsum ste /
translated: They should be explained as before.🔽Three of lower realms are the three objects to be abandoned by the path of meditation: those abandoned by the path of seeing that which views suffering and origin and those abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: de dag nyid dang zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems skal pa mi mnyam pa'i khams kun tu 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag dang / @123a * //
analyzed: de dag nyid dang zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems skal pa mi mnyam pa'i khams kun tu 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dag dang / @123a * //
translated: Two of higher realms are the two objects to be abandoned by the path of meditation: those abandoned by the path of seeing that which views suffering and origin and those abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba thos pa las byung ba'am bsams pa las byung ba dang / gzugs med pa'i gcig ste /
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba thos pa las byung ba'am bsams pa las byung ba dang / gzugs med pa'i gcig ste /
translated: The object fields of the knowledge of others minds are the same as those of the knowledge of extinction.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of nonarising are the same as those of the knowledge of nonproduction.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of suffering and origin are the same as those of the knowledge of the truths of suffering and origin.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs kyis bsdus pa'i kho na dang / zag pa med pa rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs kyis bsdus pa'i kho na dang / zag pa med pa rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The object fields of the knowledge of the path are the same as those of the knowledge of the truth of the path.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of destruction are the same as those of the knowledge of destruction.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of nonarising are the formless realm.

original: gzugs med las skyes khams gsum gtogs //
analyzed: gzugs med las skyes khams gsum gtogs //
translated: The object fields of the knowledge of others minds are the three realms.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of extinction and the knowledge of nonarising are the uncontaminated.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of suffering and origin are the three realms.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of the path are the uncontaminated.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of destruction and the knowledge of nonarising are the uncontaminated.

original: gsum dang zag med spyod yul lo //
analyzed: gsum dang zag med spyod yul lo //
translated: The object fields of the knowledge of others minds are the three realms.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of extinction and the knowledge of nonarising are the uncontaminated.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of suffering and origin are the three realms.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of the path are the uncontaminated.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of destruction and the knowledge of nonarising are the uncontaminated.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of others minds are the three realms.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of extinction and the knowledge of nonarising are the uncontaminated.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of suffering and origin are the three realms.

original: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum du gtogs pa gsum gsum dang / zag pa med pa'i spyod yul yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni khams gsum du gtogs pa gsum gsum dang / zag pa med pa'i spyod yul yin te /
translated: The object fields of the knowledge of the path are the uncontaminated.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of destruction and the knowledge of nonarising are the uncontaminated.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of others minds are the three realms.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of extinction and the knowledge of nonarising are the uncontaminated.

original: de dag nyid ces bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba de dag kho na'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag nyid ces bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba de dag kho na'i dbang du byas pa yin no //
translated: The object fields of the knowledge of suffering and origin are the three realms.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of the path are the uncontaminated.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of destruction and the knowledge of nonarising are the uncontaminated.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of others minds are the three realms.🔽The object fields of the knowledge of extinction and the knowledge of

original: rnam pa gsum gsum ste de dag nyid dang zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams su kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum gsum ste de dag nyid dang zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba skal ba mi mnyam pa'i khams su kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa bzhi dang /
translated: Those themselves means four that are concomitant with the pervasive states abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering and origin in the desire and form realms.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ci rigs par gnyis dang / rang gi khams pa gsum ste /
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ci rigs par gnyis dang / rang gi khams pa gsum ste /
translated: Two that are abandoned by the path of meditation and three that are of its own realm.

original: gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

original: ci rigs par kun du 'gro ba dang / kun du 'gro ba ma yin pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa gnyis dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang zag pa med pa ste /
analyzed: ci rigs par kun du 'gro ba dang / kun du 'gro ba ma yin pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa gnyis dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang zag pa med pa ste /
translated: Two that are concomitant with the pervasive and nonpervasive states and those abandoned by the path of meditation and uncontaminated states.

original: sems bcu'i dmigs pa yin no //🔽'gog dang lam mthong spang bya kun //
analyzed: sems bcu'i dmigs pa yin no // 'gog dang lam mthong spang bya kun //
translated: These are the objects of ten minds.🔽All objects to be abandoned by seeing

original: rang gis klags pa'i spyod yul lo //
analyzed: rang gis klags pa'i spyod yul lo //
translated: cessation and path are the domain of their own level.

original: zhes bya ba la kun zhes bya ba smos pa ni khams gsum pa nye bar bsdu ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la kun zhes bya ba smos pa ni khams gsum pa nye bar bsdu ba'i phyir ro //
translated: All means the three realms are included.

original: rang gis kla gas pa'i spyod yul yin no zhes 'byung bas shugs kyis na sngar bshad pa rnams kyi spyod yul yang yin no zhes bshad pa yin no //🔽rnam pa gcig tu na rang gis bsnan pa ni /
analyzed: rang gis kla gas pa'i spyod yul yin no zhes 'byung bas shugs kyis na sngar bshad pa rnams kyi spyod yul yang yin no zhes bshad pa yin no // rnam pa gcig tu na rang gis bsnan pa ni /
translated: This also implicitly explains the domain of the previously mentioned three.

original: rang gis klags pa ste /
analyzed: rang gis klags pa ste /
translated: Alternatively, that which is increased by oneself is that which is increased by oneself.

original: rang gis klags pa rnams kyi spyod yul ni rang gis klags pa'i spyod yul lo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rang gis klags pa rnams kyi spyod yul ni rang gis klags pa'i spyod yul lo zhes bya'o //
translated: The domain of that which is increased by oneself is the domain of that which is increased by oneself.

original: des klags pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yin gyi log par lta ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: des klags pa'i zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i yin gyi log par lta ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: That which is increased by that is associated with attachment and so on, but it is not associated with wrong view and so on,

original: de ni rtag tu 'gog pa dang lam la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rtag tu 'gog pa dang lam la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that always focuses on cessation and the path.

original: sngar bshad pa lnga zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa gsum po ris gnyis kyis kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs @123b par ldan pa dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa lnga zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa na spyod pa gsum po ris gnyis kyis kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs @123b par ldan pa dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang /
translated: The five previously explained are the three of the desire realm: the pervasive negative tendencies associated with the two higher realms and those abandoned by the path of meditation, and those of the form realm that are abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: zag pa med pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zag pa med pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: And uncontaminated states.🔽The same applies to those that are to be abandoned by seeing the truth of the path.

original: lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste zhes bya ba la ci zhig de dang 'dra zhe na sems drug gi dmigs pa yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra ste zhes bya ba la ci zhig de dang 'dra zhe na sems drug gi dmigs pa yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What is the same? They are the focal objects of six minds.🔽They are the focal objects of nine or eleven minds.

original: sems dgu dang bcu gcig gi dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzugs na spyod pa 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i chos dag ni sems dgu'i dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: sems dgu dang bcu gcig gi dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gzugs na spyod pa 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i chos dag ni sems dgu'i dmigs pa yin no //
translated: Dharmas of the form realm that are to be abandoned by seeing the truths of cessation and the path are the focal objects of nine minds.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa dag ni bcu gcig gi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa dag ni bcu gcig gi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: Those of the formless realm are the focal objects of eleven minds.

original: ji ltar zhe na gzugs na spyod pa 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag ni 'dod pa'i khams na spyod pa gsum po skal pa mi mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na gzugs na spyod pa 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag ni 'dod pa'i khams na spyod pa gsum po skal pa mi mnyam pa'i khams kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang /
translated: How? Those objects abandoned by seeing the truths of cessation and path in the form realm are the three objects abandoned in the desire realm: the pervasive negative tendencies focusing on different realms, those concomitant with negative tendencies and those abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: rang gi khams pa gsum ste /
analyzed: rang gi khams pa gsum ste /
translated: And the three objects of its own realm:

original: rigs gnyis kyis kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyis bsdus pa dang / zag pa med pa rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa dang 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: rigs gnyis kyis kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyis bsdus pa dang / zag pa med pa rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa dang 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'am /
translated: the two types of pervasive negative tendencies focusing on different realms, those concomitant with negative tendencies and those abandoned by the path of meditation and the object abandoned by the path of meditation in the formless realm subsumed by the base of infinite space, uncontaminated states, the side that is compatible with subsequent knowledge and objects abandoned by seeing the truths of cessation and path.

original: lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems klags pa de nyid de so sor sems dgu'i dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems klags pa de nyid de so sor sems dgu'i dmigs pa yin no //
translated: Or the mind that is the object abandoned by seeing the truths of cessation and path is the object of nine minds.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i chos dag kyang so sor sems bcu gcig gi dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa ni 'gog pa dang lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i chos dag kyang so sor sems bcu gcig gi dmigs pa yin te /
translated: Also, phenomena of the formless realm that are to be abandoned by seeing the truths of cessation and path are the focal objects of eleven minds.

original: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa drug ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa drug ste /
translated: The six of the desire and form realms

original: skal pa mi mnyam pa'i khams su kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang / rang gi khams pa gsum ste /
analyzed: skal pa mi mnyam pa'i khams su kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang / rang gi khams pa gsum ste /
translated: are the pervasive negative tendencies of different realms, those concomitant with negative tendencies, those to be abandoned by the path of meditation and the three of one's own realm.

original: kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang / so sor 'gog pa dang / lam mthong bas spang bar bya bas rang gis klags pa dang / zag pa med pa rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa ste /
analyzed: kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang / so sor 'gog pa dang / lam mthong bas spang bar bya bas rang gis klags pa dang / zag pa med pa rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa ste /
translated: The pervasive negative tendencies of different realms, those concomitant with negative tendencies, those to be abandoned by the path of meditation, the specific afflicted view of the self and the specific afflicted view of holding to an extreme of one's own realm, the focal object of the path of seeing that is the specific cessation and the specific path of one's own realm and the uncontaminated subsequent knowledge of the summit of existence.

original: de ltar na bcu gcig gi dmigs pa yin no //🔽zag med khams gsum mthar gsum dang // zag pa med pa'i spyod yul lo //
analyzed: de ltar na bcu gcig gi dmigs pa yin no // zag med khams gsum mthar gsum dang // zag pa med pa'i spyod yul lo //
translated: Thus they are the focal objects of eleven minds.🔽The uncontaminated is the three final realms and the uncontaminated object field.

original: zhes bya ba la zag pa med pa 'gog @124a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la zag pa med pa 'gog @124a * //
translated: The uncontaminated object field is the three final realms of the summit of existence, the state of nondiscernment and the base of nothingness and the uncontaminated object field.

original: pa la sogs pa ni ci rigs par khams gsum pa dag na tha ma gsum po 'gog pa dang lam mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i mtshan nyid gang dag yin pa de dag dang / zag pa med pa'i spyod yul yin no //🔽ji lta zhe na so sor brtags pas 'gog pa dang 'phags pa'i lam dag ni de dag la dmigs pa'i log par lta ba dang / the tshom dang ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dge ba rnams dang /
analyzed: pa la sogs pa ni ci rigs par khams gsum pa dag na tha ma gsum po 'gog pa dang lam mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i mtshan nyid gang dag yin pa de dag dang / zag pa med pa'i spyod yul yin no // ji lta zhe na so sor brtags pas 'gog pa dang 'phags pa'i lam dag ni de dag la dmigs pa'i log par lta ba dang / the tshom dang ma rig pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa rnams dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dge ba rnams dang /
translated: The last three characteristics of the three realms are the objects of uncontaminated wisdom.

original: zag pa med par ci rigs par chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: zag pa med par ci rigs par chos shes pa dang rjes su shes pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i dmigs pa yin no //
translated: How is this? The cessation of analytical cessation and the noble path are the objects of the wisdom of Dharma and subsequent knowledge that is compatible with the uncontaminated state, respectively, since they are concomitant with wrong view, doubt and ignorance that focus on them and since they are virtuous objects to be abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: nam mkha' dang so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dag ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i sems nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa kho na'i dmigs pa yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dag ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i sems nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa kho na'i dmigs pa yin no zhes bya bar rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that space and nonanalytical cessation are the focal objects of only the afflicted and unafflicted minds that are to be abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: slob dpon yon tan blo gros dang dbyig gnyen dag na re nam mkha' dang so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dag bsgom pas spang bar bya ba nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i dmigs pa yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: slob dpon yon tan blo gros dang dbyig gnyen dag na re nam mkha' dang so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa dag bsgom pas spang bar bya ba nyon mongs pa can dang nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i dmigs pa yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Master Guṇamati and Vasubandhu say that space and nonanalytical cessation are the focal objects of both the afflicted and unafflicted minds that are to be abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is illogical because it is ascertained that:🔽Those objects abandoned by seeing

original: 'gog dang lam mthong spang bya ba //🔽log lta the tshom de dag dang // ldan dang 'ba' zhig ma rig dang // drug ni zag med spyod yul can //
analyzed: 'gog dang lam mthong spang bya ba // log lta the tshom de dag dang // ldan dang 'ba' zhig ma rig dang // drug ni zag med spyod yul can //
translated: cessation and the truth of the path🔽are the focal objects of wrong view,🔽doubt, ignorance concomitant with them,🔽and ignorance alone,

original: zhes bya bar nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya bar nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: for these six possess the uncontaminated as their object field.

original: de bas na bsgom pas spang bar bya ba nyon mongs pa can gyi dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na bsgom pas spang bar bya ba nyon mongs pa can gyi dmigs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not a tenet that the object of the afflicted view of self is the object of meditation.

original: rnam shes lnga brgyad bcu dang ni //
analyzed: rnam shes lnga brgyad bcu dang ni //
translated: The object of the afflicted view of self is the five, eight, ten,

original: rnam shes bcu yi spyod yul te //
analyzed: rnam shes bcu yi spyod yul te //
translated: and the ten consciousnesses.

original: zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba 'dod pa na spyod pa dag ni lnga'i spyod yul yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba 'dod pa na spyod pa dag ni lnga'i spyod yul yin no //
translated: The object of the afflicted view of self is the five consciousnesses in the realm of desire, because it is abandoned by the path of seeing and the path of meditation that abandon the truths of suffering and origin.

original: gzugs na spyod pa dag ni brgyad kyi yin no //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa dag ni brgyad kyi yin no //
translated: It is the object of the eight consciousnesses in the realm of form.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa dag ni bcu'i yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa dag ni bcu'i yin no //
translated: It is the object of the ten consciousnesses in the formless realm.

original: dri ma med pa dag kyang bcu kho na'i yin no zhes gong du bshad pa'i rjes su 'brang ste sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: dri ma med pa dag kyang bcu kho na'i yin no zhes gong du bshad pa'i rjes su 'brang ste sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: It is the object of the ten stainless consciousnesses.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pas bsgom pas spang ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga'i bde ba'i dbang po'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pas bsgom pas spang ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga'i bde ba'i dbang po'o //
translated: The object of the afflicted view of self in the realm of desire is the faculty of pleasure of the five consciousnesses, because it is abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: gzugs na spyod pa rnam pa lnga dang zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa rnam par shes pa'i tshogs gsum dang / bsam @124b gtan gsum pa'i sa pa yid kyi sa pa yin te /
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa rnam pa lnga dang zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa rnam par shes pa'i tshogs gsum dang / bsam @124b gtan gsum pa'i sa pa yid kyi sa pa yin te /
translated: The first absorption level has three types of consciousness, and the third absorption level has the mental faculty.

original: mdor bsdus nas ci rigs par sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba nas bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i bar rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: mdor bsdus nas ci rigs par sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba nas bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i bar rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: In brief, they are five types, from objects to be abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering up to objects to be abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: zag pa med pa ni bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa pa kho na'o //
analyzed: zag pa med pa ni bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa pa kho na'o //
translated: The uncontaminated is only the level of the third absorption.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa rnam pa bzhi dang zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang lam mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa rnam pa bzhi dang zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang lam mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'o //
translated: The desire realm has four types.

original: bde ba'i dbang po ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag gi dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: bde ba'i dbang po ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag gi dmigs pa yin te /
translated: The faculty of pleasure is the focal object of objects to be abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering and origin.

original: 'di ltar rang gi sa pa 'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar rang gi sa pa 'am /
translated: In this way, it is the focal object of the five types of consciousness of the desire realm.

original: sa gong ma pa'i bde ba'i dbang po ni 'jig tshogs dang log par lta ba la sogs pa'i dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: sa gong ma pa'i bde ba'i dbang po ni 'jig tshogs dang log par lta ba la sogs pa'i dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The faculty of pleasure of the higher stages is the focal object of the afflicted view of the self, wrong view and so on.

original: lam gyis bsdus pa'i bde ba'i dbang po ni lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba log par lta ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: lam gyis bsdus pa'i bde ba'i dbang po ni lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba log par lta ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The faculty of pleasure subsumed by the path is the focal object of wrong view and so on that are to be abandoned by the path of seeing.

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga ba'i bde ba'i dbang po de ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba 'dod chags la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga ba'i bde ba'i dbang po de ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba 'dod chags la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dmigs pa yin te /
translated: The faculty of pleasure of the fivefold collection of consciousness is the focal object of attachment and so on that are to be abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: de ltar na de ni rnam pa bzhi'i dmigs pa yin no //🔽'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems kyi dmigs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na de ni rnam pa bzhi'i dmigs pa yin no // 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sems kyi dmigs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus it is the focal object of four types.

original: de la log par lta ba la sogs pa ni 'gog pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: de la log par lta ba la sogs pa ni 'gog pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: It is not the focal object of the mind that is to be abandoned by the path of seeing the truth of cessation because wrong view and so on do not focus on cessation.

original: / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa yang rang gi rigs la dmigs pa'i phyir de la yang bde ba'i dbang po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: / lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa yang rang gi rigs la dmigs pa'i phyir de la yang bde ba'i dbang po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The faculty of pleasure also does not exist in the realms of form and the formless, because the view that grasps bad views as supreme and so on also focus on their own type, and because the faculty of pleasure does not exist there.

original: gzugs na spyod pa rnam pa lnga dang zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gsum pas bsdus pa'i bde ba'i dbang po rnam pa lnga yin no //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa rnam pa lnga dang zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar bsam gtan gsum pas bsdus pa'i bde ba'i dbang po rnam pa lnga yin no //
translated: The five types that exist in the realm of form are the faculty of pleasure that is included in the third absorption.🔽The faculty of pleasure that is included in the path is the object of the mind that is to be abandoned by seeing the truth of the path and by the path of meditation.

original: lam mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni lam gyis bsdus pa'i bde ba'i dbang po ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sems lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba log par lta ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dmigs🔽pa yin no //
analyzed: lam mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang zhes bya ba ni lam gyis bsdus pa'i bde ba'i dbang po ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sems lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba log par lta ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The faculty of pleasure that is included in the path is the object of the mind that is to be abandoned by seeing the truth of the path, such as wrong view and so on, that is concomitant with the mind that exists in the formless realm.

original: de nyid bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i sems dge ba'i dmigs pa yang yin no //
analyzed: de nyid bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i sems dge ba'i dmigs pa yang yin no //
translated: It is also the object of the virtuous mind that is to be abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: thams cad kyang zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin par ni srid do //
analyzed: thams cad kyang zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin par ni srid do //
translated: It is possible that all are the objects of the uncontaminated mind.

original: de la ci rigs par zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir zag pa med pa la phra rgyas dag rgyas par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang gi phyir kha cig kho na la kha cig rgyas par 'gyur ba de'i @125a * //
analyzed: de la ci rigs par zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir zag pa med pa la phra rgyas dag rgyas par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang gi phyir kha cig kho na la kha cig rgyas par 'gyur ba de'i @125a * //
translated: The phrase “as is fitting” means that in the formless realm, the negative tendencies do not increase in relation to the uncontaminated states, and that they increase in relation to some but not all contaminated states.

original: phyir ci rigs pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: phyir ci rigs pa zhes brjod do //
translated: Therefore, the phrase “as is fitting” is used.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa la'o //🔽phra rgyas 'dod pa na spyod pa na rigs bzhi dang zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni rnam par shes pa la'o // phra rgyas 'dod pa na spyod pa na rigs bzhi dang zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa /
translated: The phrase “in relation to that” means in relation to consciousness.

original: log par lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa la ni sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas bcu char yang ci rigs par dmigs pa'am /🔽mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: log par lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa la ni sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas bcu char yang ci rigs par dmigs pa'am / mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur te /
translated: The phrase “the negative tendencies that are to be abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering” means the ten negative tendencies that are to be abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering.

original: kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag kyang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: kun 'byung mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag kyang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: The phrase “in relation to the view of the reality of the body” means in relation to the view of the reality of the body that is to be abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering.🔽The phrase “as is fitting” means that the ten negative tendencies that are to be abandoned by seeing the truth of suffering increase in relation to the view of the reality of the body in two ways: as objects and as associated factors.🔽The phrase “the same is true of the negative tendencies that are to be abandoned by seeing the truth of origination” means that the ten negative tendencies that are to be abandoned by seeing the truth of origination increase in relation to the view of the reality of the body in two ways: as objects and as associated factors.

original: lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag kyang bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa de la rgyas par 'gyur te /🔽lam gyi bde ba'i dngos po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la log par lta ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs bar ldan pa la /
analyzed: lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag kyang bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa de la rgyas par 'gyur te / lam gyi bde ba'i dngos po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la log par lta ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs bar ldan pa la /
translated: Also, the objects to be abandoned by seeing the truth of the path increase in the consciousness that perceives the faculty of pleasure.🔽This is because wrong view, etc.🔽that focus on the entity of pleasure of the path increase in the consciousness that perceives the entity of pleasure of the path.🔽Wrong view, etc.

original: log par lta ba la sogs pa ni mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: log par lta ba la sogs pa ni mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: increase in the consciousness that perceives the entity of pleasure of the path through being concomitant with it.

original: lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa yang dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa yang dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur te /
translated: Also, the overesteeming of mere morality and asceticism, etc.🔽increase in the consciousness that perceives the entity of pleasure of the path through focusing on it.

original: de lta bas na rigs de yang de la rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bas na rigs de yang de la rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the seeds of those views increase in that consciousness.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i rigs kyang de la rgyas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i rigs kyang de la rgyas par 'gyur te /
translated: Also, the objects to be abandoned by the path of meditation increase in that consciousness.🔽This is because attachment, etc.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni bde ba'i dbang po las dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni bde ba'i dbang po las dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: focus on the consciousness that perceives the entity of pleasure of the path and are concomitant with it.

original: 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rigs ni de la rgyas par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rigs ni de la rgyas par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The type abandoned by seeing the truth of cessation does not increase in that.🔽

original: bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The type abandoned by seeing cessation does not increase in that realm because there is no consciousness that focuses on the faculty of pleasure.🔽Those that focus on the compounded in the form realm

original: gzugs na spyod pa 'dus byas la dmigs pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni gzugs na spyod pa'i bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa ni rnam pa lnga yod do //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa 'dus byas la dmigs pa rnams dang zhes bya ba ni gzugs na spyod pa'i bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa ni rnam pa lnga yod do //
translated: Those that focus on the compounded in the form realm have five types that focus on the faculty of pleasure in the form realm.

original: de la rigs bzhi rgyas par 'gyur ba de ni go sla'o /🔽// / bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa /
analyzed: de la rigs bzhi rgyas par 'gyur ba de ni go sla'o / // / bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa /
translated: The increase of the four types in that realm is easy to understand.

original: 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba 'dus byas la dmigs pa rnams ji ltar rgyas par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba 'dus byas la dmigs pa rnams ji ltar rgyas par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How do those that focus on the compounded and are abandoned by seeing the truth of cessation increase?

original: bsam gtan gsum pa na lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa bde ba'i dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan la de rnams kyang pa na tshun dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa na lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa bde ba'i dbang po dang mtshungs par ldan la de rnams kyang pa na tshun dmigs pa yin te /
translated: Those that are concomitant with the faculty of pleasure, such as the overesteeming of mere morality and asceticism in the third absorption, focus on each other.

original: de dag ni bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la mtshungs par ldan pa'am /
analyzed: de dag ni bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la mtshungs par ldan pa'am /
translated: They are concomitant with consciousness that focuses on the faculty of pleasure.🔽

original: dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: They increase through the faculty of pleasure either by being associated with the consciousness that takes pleasure as its object or by taking pleasure as their object.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i @125b rigs gnyis dang zhes bya ba ni lam mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i rigs dag ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i @125b rigs gnyis dang zhes bya ba ni lam mthong ba dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i rigs dag ste /
translated: The two types that occur in the formless realm are the two types that are objects to be abandoned by the paths of seeing and meditation.

original: log par lta ba la sogs pa ni lam gyi bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa log par lta ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: log par lta ba la sogs pa ni lam gyi bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa log par lta ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Wrong views and so on increase through being concomitant with the consciousness that takes the path and the faculty of pleasure as its object.

original: lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni de la dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa ni de la dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Holding a view to be paramount and so on increase through taking that as their object.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i rigs kyang rgyas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i rigs kyang rgyas par 'gyur te /
translated: The type that is to be abandoned by the path of meditation also increases.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i sems dge ba lam la dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i sems dge ba lam la dmigs pa yin la /
translated: The virtuous mind that is to be abandoned by the path of meditation takes the path as its object.

original: de la ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rigs rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rigs rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: The types of attachment and so on increase in that mind.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba rnams kyang rnam par shes pa de nyid lam la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa log par lta ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa la rgyas par 'gyur ba shes par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i phra rgyas kun du 'gro ba rnams kyang rnam par shes pa de nyid lam la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa log par lta ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa la rgyas par 'gyur ba shes par bya'o //
translated: Also, the pervasive negative tendencies that operate in the formless realm should be understood to be activated in the consciousness that is concomitant with wrong view, etc., that focuses on the path in that very consciousness.

original: rnam pa bcu gnyis po de nyid dang zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma gtogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa rnam pa bzhi dang / gzugs na spyod pa rnam pa lnga dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: rnam pa bcu gnyis po de nyid dang zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma gtogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa rnam pa bzhi dang / gzugs na spyod pa rnam pa lnga dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The twelve aspects themselves means the four aspects that occur in the desire realm, except for those to be abandoned by seeing the truth of cessation, the five aspects that occur in the form realm, and the two aspects that occur in the formless realm.

original: lam mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang / zag pa med pa ste de ltar na de dag ni phan tshun dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: lam mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang / zag pa med pa ste de ltar na de dag ni phan tshun dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, those are the aspects that focus on the consciousness that focuses on the faculty of pleasure by the method of mutually focusing on each other.

original: bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni yang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnam pa gnyis kyis klags pa de ni bden ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni yang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnam pa gnyis kyis klags pa de ni bden ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The consciousness that observes the faculty of pleasure is the two types that occur in the formless realm. That is the focal object of the consciousness that observes the faculty of pleasure.🔽What is that?

original: gang gi zhe na sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gang gi zhe na sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The two types that are to be abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering and origin🔽are the focal object of the consciousness that observes the path.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i bye brag gi rnam pa gnyis yod pa'i dmigs pa ni lam la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa gzugs med pa na spyod pa na lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i bye brag gi rnam pa gnyis yod pa'i dmigs pa ni lam la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa gzugs med pa na spyod pa na lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba
translated: The two types that are to be abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering and origin that occur in the formless realm are the focal object of the consciousness that observes the path that occurs in the formless realm and is to be abandoned by seeing the truth of the path.

original: log par lta ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dge ba yin te /
analyzed: log par lta ba la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dge ba yin te /
translated: It is concomitant with wrong view and so on and it is virtuous subha subha because it is to be abandoned by the path of meditation bhavanaheya.

original: de ltar na rnam pa bcu bzhi po 'di ni bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa @126a * //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam pa bcu bzhi po 'di ni bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa @126a * //
translated: Thus, these fourteen types are consciousnesses that focus on the object of the faculty of pleasure.

original: yin no // de la gzugs med pa na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag bskyed nas zhes bya ba ni sngar ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa kun du 'gro ba dag kho na bden pa'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par🔽shes pa la rgyas par 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: yin no // de la gzugs med pa na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag bskyed nas zhes bya ba ni sngar ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa kun du 'gro ba dag kho na bden pa'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la rgyas par 'byung ba yin no //
translated: The phrase “having generated those that are objects abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering and origin in the formless realm” means that previously the pervasive negative tendencies of the formless realm were explained as increasing in the consciousness that focuses on the faculty of pleasure.

original: bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spong bar bya ba'i rigs thams cad rgyas par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spong bar bya ba'i rigs thams cad rgyas par 'gyur te /
translated: But the phrase “having generated those that are objects abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering and origin in the formless realm” means that all types of negative tendencies of the formless realm increase in the consciousness that focuses on the object of the faculty of pleasure.

original: 'di ltar kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems de la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas rnams ci rigs par mtshungs par ldan pa'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems de la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i phra rgyas rnams ci rigs par mtshungs par ldan pa'am /
translated: Thus, the negative tendencies of the desire realm that are objects to be abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering and origin are concomitant with the mind that is concomitant with the pervasive negative tendencies.🔽

original: dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the negative tendencies to be eliminated by the paths of seeing the truths of suffering and origin are active in the mind that is concomitant with or focuses on the omnipresent mental faculty.

original: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The remaining should be connected in the same way as above.

original: lam 'dis gzhan yang khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba ni srol 'dis gzhan yang khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: lam 'dis gzhan yang khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba ni srol 'dis gzhan yang khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: One should understand the others by this method means that one should understand the others by this method.

original: ji lta zhe na sdug bsngal gyi dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i dri ba 'ongs pa la dpyad par bya sto /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na sdug bsngal gyi dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i dri ba 'ongs pa la dpyad par bya sto /
translated: How? When the question arises, “How many negative tendencies are active in the consciousness that focuses on the faculty of suffering?” one should analyze this.

original: sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni 'dod pa na spyod pa rnam pa gcig ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi dbang po ni 'dod pa na spyod pa rnam pa gcig ste /
translated: The faculty of suffering is of one type in the desire realm,

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga pa yin pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga pa yin pa'i phyir bsgom pas spang bar bya ba yin no //
translated: because it is associated with the fivefold collection of consciousness and is to be eliminated by the path of meditation.

original: de dag kyang mdor bsdu na rnam par shes pa lnga'i dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag kyang mdor bsdu na rnam par shes pa lnga'i dmigs pa yin te /
translated: If summarized, they are the focal object of five consciousnesses.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa rnam pa gsum po sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun du 'gro ba dang / mtshungs par ldan pa dag dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang / gzugs na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa rnam pa gsum po sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba kun du 'gro ba dang / mtshungs par ldan pa dag dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang / gzugs na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang /
translated: They are the focal object of the five consciousnesses of the desire realm, since they are the focal object of the three types of desire realm consciousness that are objects to be abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering and origin and objects to be abandoned by the path of meditation and the focal object of the form realm consciousness that is an object to be abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin te /
translated: They are also the focal object of uncontaminated consciousness.

original: rnam pa lnga po 'di ni sdug bsngal la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa lnga po 'di ni sdug bsngal la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin no //
translated: These five types of consciousness are consciousness focusing on suffering.

original: de la ci rigs par 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ris gsum po sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rigs dag ni kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems de dang /
analyzed: de la ci rigs par 'dod pa na spyod pa'i ris gsum po sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams la sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i rigs dag ni kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems de dang /
translated: The three types of desire realm consciousness that are objects to be abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering and origin and objects to be abandoned by the path of meditation focus on the two types of desire realm consciousness that are objects to be abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering and origin.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i sems la ci rigs par mtshungs par ldan pa'am /🔽dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur @126b ro ;
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i sems la ci rigs par mtshungs par ldan pa'am / dmigs pa'i sgo nas rgyas par 'gyur @126b ro ;
translated: They increase in the mind that is to be abandoned by cultivation, either through association or through the object-field.

original: ; bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i rigs ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba la rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ; bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i rigs ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba la rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: The type that is to be abandoned by cultivation increases in the mind that is to be abandoned by cultivation.

original: gzugs na spyod pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba gcig ste /
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba gcig ste /
translated: The pervasive negative tendencies of the form realm increase in the mind that is to be abandoned by cultivation.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i sems la rgyas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i sems la rgyas par 'gyur ro //
translated: The pervasive negative tendencies of the formless realm increase in the mind that is to be abandoned by cultivation.

original: gzugs na spyod pa kun du 'gro ba rnams kyang de kho na la rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o //🔽sdug bsngal gyi dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa kun du 'gro ba rnams kyang de kho na la rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o // sdug bsngal gyi dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: The pervasive negative tendencies of the form realm increase in the mind that is to be abandoned by cultivation.🔽How many negative tendencies increase in the consciousness that has the faculty of pain as its object?

original: sdug bsngal gyi dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa lnga po de rnam par shes pa gang gi dmigs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa lnga po de rnam par shes pa gang gi dmigs pa yin zhe na /
translated: In what consciousness do the five consciousnesses that have the faculty of pain as their object increase?

original: phan tshun dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa lnga po de nyid kyi dmigs pa yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa lnga po de nyid kyi dmigs pa yin no //
translated: The five types of object are the objects of the five types of consciousness that have the aspect of the faculty of pain.

original: yang 'dod pa na spyod pa lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba zag pa med pa la dmigs pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dmigs pa yang yin te /
analyzed: yang 'dod pa na spyod pa lam mthong bas spang bar bya ba zag pa med pa la dmigs pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa kun du 'gro ba dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dmigs pa yang yin te /
translated: Moreover, the object of the uncontaminated form realm that is to be abandoned by seeing the truth of the path and the object of the pervasive negative tendency associated with the form realm are also its objects.

original: des ni gzugs na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dge ba sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dmigs pa la dmigs par byed do //
analyzed: des ni gzugs na spyod pa bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dge ba sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dmigs pa la dmigs par byed do //
translated: Because it focuses on the object of the virtuous faculty of pain that is to be abandoned by the path of cultivation in the form realm.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs kyis bsdus pa yang rags pa la sogs pa'i rnam par sdug bsngal gyi dbang po la dmigs pa de la dmigs te ;
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nyer bsdogs kyis bsdus pa yang rags pa la sogs pa'i rnam par sdug bsngal gyi dbang po la dmigs pa de la dmigs te ;
translated: The object of the preparatory stage of the base of infinite space in the formless realm is also the object of the faculty of pain that has the aspects of grossness, etc.

original: de lta bas na rnam pa brgyad po 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bas na rnam pa brgyad po 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, these eight types are the consciousnesses that focus on the object of the faculty of pain.

original: de la 'dod pa na spyod pa'i phra rgyas rigs bzhi ste /
analyzed: de la 'dod pa na spyod pa'i phra rgyas rigs bzhi ste /
translated: There are four types of negative tendencies anufaya that are objects to be abandoned by the path of seeing:🔽those abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering, origin, path and cessation and those abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang / lam mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spong bar bya ba rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa rigs gsum ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang / lam mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spong bar bya ba rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa rigs gsum ste /
translated: There are three types of negative tendencies that are objects to be abandoned by the path of seeing:🔽those abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering, origin and cessation and those abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa gcig ste /
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa gcig ste /
translated: There is one type of negative tendency that is an object to be abandoned by the path of meditation:🔽those abandoned by the path of meditation.

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang / kun du 'gro ba rnams rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba rnams dang / kun du 'gro ba rnams rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: The pervasive negative tendencies increase in the desire realm, the form realm and the formless realm.

original: yang yid bde ba'i dbang po dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i dri ba 'ongs pa la dpyad par bya ste /
analyzed: yang yid bde ba'i dbang po dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i dri ba 'ongs pa la dpyad par bya ste /
translated: Now, in response to the question, how many negative tendencies increase in the consciousness that is the object of the faculty of mental satisfaction?

original: yid bde ba'i dbang po ni rnam pa bcu gcig ste /
analyzed: yid bde ba'i dbang po ni rnam pa bcu gcig ste /
translated: The faculty of mental satisfaction has eleven types:

original: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa rnam pa lnga lnga dang / zag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa rnam pa lnga lnga dang / zag pa med pa'o //
translated: five that are objects to be abandoned by the path of seeing in the desire realm and five that are objects to be abandoned by the path of seeing in the form realm and uncontaminated mental satisfaction.

original: de dag kyang mdor bsdu na rnam @127a * //
analyzed: de dag kyang mdor bsdu na rnam @127a * //
translated: If these are summarized, they are as follows.🔽

original: par shes pa rnam pa bcu gsum gyi dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: par shes pa rnam pa bcu gsum gyi dmigs pa yin te /
translated: In brief, they are the focal object of thirteen types of consciousness.

original: de ni 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa 'dus byas la dmigs pa rnam pa lnga'i dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'dus byas yin pa'i phyir 'dod pa na spyod pa 'dus byas la dmigs pa rnam pa lnga'i dmigs pa yin te /
translated: They are the focal object of five types of consciousness that focus on conditioned states in the desire realm because they are conditioned states.

original: gzugs na spyod pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: gzugs na spyod pa yang de dang 'dra'o //
translated: They are also the focal object of five types of consciousness that focus on conditioned states in the form realm.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa gnyis kyi ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa gnyis kyi ste /
translated: They are the focal object of two types of consciousness in the formless realm:

original: lam mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang / zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: lam mthong ba dang / bsgom pas spang bar bya ba dang / zag pa med pa'i dmigs pa yin te /
translated: those that focus on the path and those that focus on uncontaminated states.

original: rnam pa bcu gsum po 'di ni yid bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa bcu gsum po 'di ni yid bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin no //
translated: These thirteen types of consciousness focus on the faculty of mental satisfaction.

original: de la ci rigs par phra rgyas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa la 'dus byas la dmigs pa rigs lnga dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i rigs gnyis dang / kun du 'gro ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de la ci rigs par phra rgyas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa la 'dus byas la dmigs pa rigs lnga dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i rigs gnyis dang / kun du 'gro ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
translated: The five types of consciousness that focus on conditioned states in the desire realm and the form realm and the two types of consciousness that focus on conditioned states in the formless realm and the pervasive negative tendencies increase in relation to them in whatever way is possible.

original: yid bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: yid bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa la phra rgyas du zhig rgyas par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How many negative tendencies are developed in relation to the consciousness that takes the faculty of mental satisfaction as its object?

original: yid bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnam pa bcu gsum po de rnam par shes pa gang gi dmigs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: yid bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnam pa bcu gsum po de rnam par shes pa gang gi dmigs pa yin zhe na /
translated: What consciousnesses take the thirteen types of consciousness that take the faculty of mental satisfaction as their object as their object?

original: rnam pa bcu gsum po de nyid dang yang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: rnam pa bcu gsum po de nyid dang yang gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Those thirteen types and also the two types that occur in the formless realm

original: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i dmigs pa yin te /
translated: are the objects of the consciousnesses to be abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering and origin.

original: rnam pa bco lnga po 'di ni yid bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa bco lnga po 'di ni yid bde ba'i dbang po la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa yin no //
translated: These fifteen types are the consciousnesses that take the faculty of mental satisfaction as their object.

original: de la phra rgyas gzugs med pa na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag bskyed nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa 'dus byas la dmigs pa rnams dang / 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma gtogs pa gzugs med pa na spyod pa rigs bzhi rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par bya ste /
analyzed: de la phra rgyas gzugs med pa na spyod pa sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba mthong bas spang bar bya ba dag bskyed nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa 'dus byas la dmigs pa rnams dang / 'gog pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba ma gtogs pa gzugs med pa na spyod pa rigs bzhi rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood that when the negative tendencies of the formless realm that are to be abandoned by seeing the truths of suffering and origin are generated, the four types of negative tendencies of the formless realm increase, except for those to be abandoned by seeing the truth of cessation, and those that focus on the conditioned of the desire and form realms.

original: phyogs 'dis gzhan yang khong du chud par bya'o //🔽nyon mongs phra rgyas bcas rnam gnyis //
analyzed: phyogs 'dis gzhan yang khong du chud par bya'o // nyon mongs phra rgyas bcas rnam gnyis //
translated: One should understand the other cases by this method.🔽Afflictions with negative tendencies are of two types.

original: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can ni phra rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rgyas par mi 'gyur ba dag gi phra rgyas dang bcas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can ni phra rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / rgyas par mi 'gyur ba dag gi phra rgyas dang bcas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that afflictions are either with negative tendencies or without negative tendencies.

original: de dag lhan cig 'dug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lhan cig 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag lhan cig 'dug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni lhan cig 'dug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they coexist.

original: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ni dbral bar nus pa'i phyir rgyas par 'gyur ba dag kho nas phra rgyas @127b dang bcas pa yin te /🔽'di ltar nyon mongs pa ni dmigs pa las /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ni dbral bar nus pa'i phyir rgyas par 'gyur ba dag kho nas phra rgyas @127b dang bcas pa yin te / 'di ltar nyon mongs pa ni dmigs pa las /
translated: Non-defiled states are not augmented by those that augment, because they can be separated from them.

original: spang bar bya bar 'dod pa yin zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro //🔽ma spangs shing yongs su ma shes pa yin zhes bya ba la ma spangs pa ni de'i thob pa ma bcad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spang bar bya bar 'dod pa yin zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro // ma spangs shing yongs su ma shes pa yin zhes bya ba la ma spangs pa ni de'i thob pa ma bcad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For it is said that afflictions are abandoned by means of the object.
